Afternoon of a Faun, is a symphonic poem for orchestra by Claude Debussy, 
approximately 10 minutes in duration. It was first performed in Paris on December 
22, 1894, conducted by Gustave ... Debussy's work later provided the basis for 
the ballet Afternoon of a Faun...
